title: Elegant Kobe Luxury with Seven Mouthwatering Restaurants
description: Immerse yourself in the wonders of Japan's culinary scene with a stay at the glamorous ANA Crowne Plaza Kobe, an IHG Hotel. See all the best sights and bright lights of vibrant Kobe, while indulging in delicious cuisine as you explore the birthplace of the famous Kobe beef. After days of exploring, energise in the hotel's bright indoor pool and fitness centre, make use of the onsite business centre and celebrate your stay at one of the seven onsite restaurants.
location_description: ANA Crowne Plaza Kobe, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: 1 Chome Kitanocho, Chuo Ward, Kobe, Hyogo 650-0002, Japan
